name: Daughter of Crone
description:
Daughter of Crone is an RPG for the PC with 2D pixel graphics. It is inspired by Japanese roleplaying games of the classic era. The game tells the story of a young witch, who lives in a forest on the outskirts of a medieval village. In the game you can forage and grow your own herbs, brew potions, fight monsters and help the villagers in their daily lives.

The purpose of the game demo was to showcase the central game mechanics and visuals in the game and to raise interest to the story of the game.

The demo version will be available here, free of charge. We would appreciate if you have the time to give us feedback through this Link.

The full release of the game will be somewhere in the far future (aiming for 2023) and it will be published at least in itch.io.
